DataElement.preferredName: Patient Blood Pressure Measurement Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes/no criteria stating whether a patient is willing and able to record daily blood pressure measurements

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Blood Pressure Measurement Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._The pressure of the circulating blood against the walls of the blood vessels._Annotation used to indicate the size or magnitude of something that was determined by comparison to a standard._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Blood Pressure Measurement Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: The pressure of the circulating blood against the walls of the blood vessels.:Annotation used to indicate the size or magnitude of something that was determined by comparison to a standard.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: The pressure of the circulating blood against the walls of the blood vessels.
Annotation used to indicate the size or magnitude of something that was determined by comparison to a standard.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
